summary.para: Loads attributes from a stream into an attribute store.

param.name: pAttr
param.para: Pointer to the interface of the attribute store.

param.name: dwOptions
param.para: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

param.name: pStm
param.para: Pointer to the IStream interface of the stream from which to read the attributes.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: Use this function to deserialize an attribute store that was serialized with the function.
If dwOptions contains the MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_UNKNOWN_BYREF flag, the function deserializes IUnknown pointers from the stream, as follows:

description.para: If the IStream pointer exposes the interface (through QueryInterface), the function calls to deserialize each pointer.
Otherwise, the function calls CoUnmarshalInterface to deserialize a proxy for the object.

remarks.para: This function deletes any attributes that were previously stored in pAttr.

summary.para: Writes the contents of an attribute store to a stream.

param.name: pAttr
param.para: Pointer to the interface of the attribute store.

param.name: dwOptions
param.para: Bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

param.name: pStm
param.para: Pointer to the IStream interface of the stream where the attributes are saved.

returns.para: The function returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: If dwOptions contains the MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_UNKNOWN_BYREF flag, the function serializes IUnknown pointers in the attribute store, as follows:

description.para: If the IStream pointer exposes the interface (through QueryInterface), the function calls to serialize each pointer.
Otherwise, the function calls CoMarshalInterface to serialize a proxy for the object.

remarks.para: If dwOptions does not include the MF_ATTRIBUTE_SERIALIZE_UNKNOWN_BYREF flag, the function skips IUnknown pointers in the attribute store.
To load the attributes from the stream, call .
The main purpose of this function is to marshal attributes across process boundaries.
